meanings.definition: A colorless crystalline compound used as a smoke screen in warfare.
meanings.sent1: During the battle, the soldiers deployed hexachloroethane to create a thick smoke screen.
meanings.sent2: The military used hexachloroethane to obscure their movements from the enemy.
meanings.sent3: The hexachloroethane smoke screen was so dense that even the birds got confused!
meanings.sent4: The hexachloroethane smoke hung in the air like a mysterious veil over the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The hexachloroethane smoke enveloped everything in a shroud of secrecy.

meanings.definition: A compound used in the manufacture of dyes and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers mixed hexachloroethane into the dye solution for vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: Hexachloroethane is an important ingredient in the production of certain pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent3: The hexachloroethane dye turned out to be a surprisingly popular choice among customers.
meanings.sent4: In the world of pharmaceuticals, hexachloroethane is like the secret ingredient in a recipe.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant hues created by hexachloroethane dyes brightened up the entire room.
